alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued August 29 at 2:59AM PDT until September 04 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 113 possible. * WHERE...Coachella Valley and San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts
